snippet: Belgian traditionalists are up in arms over a decision to replace the annual Christmas tree in the main square of Brussels with a structure of steel-framed cubes. But the controversy has also stirred some racist reactions with an undercurrent of...
abstract: Belgian traditionalists are up in arms over a decision to replace the annual Christmas tree in the main square of Brussels with a structure of steel-framed cubes. But the controversy has also stirred some racist reactions with an undercurrent of Islamophobia.

headline.main: Christmas Tree Controversy Fires Multicultural Belgium
